details__text: Start your business on the Internet with OLX!
about__text2: Uzbekistan private announcements OLX (former torg.uz) â€“ you'll find what you're looking for here.
about__text3: By clicking on the 'post add' button, you can place an online ad on any topic-job search, service, sales of cars, real estate, electronics, etc.
about__text4: With the help of the OLX Uzbekistan service, you can sell or buy almost everything you want. Using the search function, you will be able to find the available ads in the cersis on the topic of your interest without any difficulties.
about__text5: OLX Uzbekistan is your reliable and unmatched assistant.
